txt.en: He looks at you proudly. You seem to have proven to him that you are not a weak link after all.

The master stallion is perched upon a hill overlooking the horse-farm.  He has a good vantage point from which to keep an eye on his herd.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
The first gate is just to the east of the master, down the hill.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
The second gate is located east and a little south of the first gate.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to the horsefields.</rgb>
The third gate is located south-east of the second gate.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
The fourth gate is located south of the third gate.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
The fifth gate is located south-west of the fourth gate.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
The sixth gate is located north-west of the fifth gate.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
The seventh gate is located north of the sixth gate.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
The eighth gate is located north of the seventh gate.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
The master is found overlooking the fields on his hill, just north of the ninth gate.  \n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
Talk to the master stallion in the Horse-fields
The ninth gate is located north-east of the eighth gate.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
You are defeated and retreating to the horse-fields!
The master is found overlooking the fields on his hill, just north of the eighth gate.  \n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If defeated or time expires, you will return to Hengstacer Farm.</rgb>
You didn't make it in time!
Any herd of horses will establish a pecking order, and the strongest amongst them leads the others. It is time to meet the master stallion of the Horsefields to prove yourself to him.
You didn't make it in time!
You didn't make it in time!
You are defeated and retreating to the horse-fields!

'These are my fields, and if you wish to stay here for a while, you must pass my test. Any horse that can pull his weight can make it around the eastern track in less than five minutes. I need to make sure every horse in my herd can pull his weight. There will be no weak links in my chain.'
